Title: Object: Abraham in Aegyptum cum uxore sua ob famen peregrinatur
Description: Abraham going to Egypt with his wife Sara, after Castiglione: landscape with at centre a woman on a horse addressing a bearded man standing by her side; they are surrounded by sheep; on the right, a shepherd boy in classical garb playing a pipe, and a turbaned boy looking behind him; on the right, another shepherd boy leading the procession, accompanied by two dogs; with Coypel's excudit replacing that of Chasteau Etching
